alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 12:29AM CST until January 25 at 12:45AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CST FOR EASTERN HARRISON AND SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lyman, or near Gulfport, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, St. Martin, D`iberville, Latimer, Gulf Hills, Lyman, Gulf Park Estates and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 33 and 54. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for southern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
